name: et
label: $E_T$
description: Transverse particle energy on the calorimeter (L2Calo stage)

name: et
label: $E_T$
description: Transverse particle energy on the calorimeter (Offline stage)

name: reta
label: $R_{\eta}$
description: Ratio of the energy in 3x7 cells over the energy in 7x7 cells centred at the electron cluster position on EM2 (L2Calo Stage)

name: eratio
label: $E_{ratio}$
description: Ratio of the energy difference between the maximum energy deposit and the energy deposit in a secondary maximum in the cluster to the sum of these energies (L2Calo Stage)

name: f1
label: $f_1$
description: Ratio of the energy in the first layer to the total energy in the EM calorimeter (L2Calo Stage)

name: f3
label: $f_3$
description: Ratio of the energy in the third layer to the total energy in the EM calorimeter. This variable is only used for et < 80 GeV, due to inefficiencies at high et, and is also removed from the LH for |eta| > 2.37, where it is poorly modelled by the simulation (L2Calo Stage)

name: wstot
label: $\omega_{stot}$
description: Shower width er > 150 GeV only on EM1 (L2Calo Stage)

name: weta2
label: $\omega_{\eta^2}$
formula: $\omega_{\eta2} = \sqrt{\frac{\Sigma E_i \: X\:  \eta^2_{i}}{\Sigma E_i} -(\frac{\Sigma E_i \: X \: \eta_{i}}{\Sigma E_i})^2}$
description: Lateral shower width on EM2 (L2Calo Stage)

name: dr
label: $\Delta R$
description: angular separation between particles from same decay (L2Calo Stage TaP only)

name: rhad
label: $R_{had}$
description: Ratio of et in the first layer of the hadronic calorimeter to et of the EM cluster (used over the range 0.8<|eta|1.37) (Offline stage)

name: rhad1
label: $R_{had1}$
description: Ratio of et in the first layer of the hadronic calorimeter to et of the EM cluster (used over the range |eta| < 0.8 or |eta| > 1.37) (Offline stage)

name: rphi
label: $R_{\phi}$
description: Ratio of the energy in 3x3 cells over the energy in 3x7 cells centred at the electron cluster position on EM2 (Offline stage)
